23504373.title: Operating and Developing Cement Capacity by Type
23504373.subtitle: Operating and developing cement capacity in million tonnes per annum (mtpa) by country, divided between Integrated plants and Grinding plants, and split between ordinary portland cement (OPC), blended cement, blast furnace slag, and unknown.

23491110.title: Operating and Developing Cement and Clinker Capacity by Color
23491110.subtitle: Operating and developing cement and clinker capacity in million tonnes per annum (mtpa) by country, divided between grey, white, grey and white, and unknown color.
